sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If it is given that \(k : l :: p : q \), then prove that
\[
	\frac{4k + 7l }{4p + 7q } = \frac{4k - 7l }{4p - 7q }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[
	\frac{k }{l } = \frac{p }{q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 k }{7 l } = \frac{4 p }{7 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 k + 7 l }{4 k - 7 l } = \frac{4 p + 7 q }{4 p - 7 q } \textrm{ {by componendo and dividendo}}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 k + 7 l }{4 p + 7 q } = \frac{4 k - 7 l }{4 p - 7 q }
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
